definition[0]: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works
example[0]: a diagram of the heating system
definition[1]: to show or represent something in a diagram
definition[2]: a drawing or plan that shows where something is, what it looks like, or how it works
example[1]: See the attached diagram for details on current market projections.
example[2]: a diagram of the electrical system
